name: muggy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
When the weather is muggy, it is unpleasantly warm and the air contains a lot of water. Synonyms
sticky
sultry (WARM)Compare
close adjective (LACKING AIR)
oppressive (WEATHER)
humid
damp adjective
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
having moisture in the airhumidIt gets so humid in this part of the country.muggyWhat a muggy day!sultryShe kept her bedroom window open to cool off during these long, sultry summer nights.stickyIt's going to be rather sticky outside, with the humidity level at almost 85 per cent and temperatures in the high 20s.
